column5: What would be the ideal set-up (line strength, lures etc) for fishing steelhead?  Thanks again,  Pags
gonna have to give us a little more than that.  Where are you fishing, river/lake/creek/harbour?  Floatfishing/bottom bouncing?
Pretty much new to the game.  How about along Bronte and the Credit?
do a search of the forums for similar questions, it will turn up a whole bunch of great threads with tons of information

Float fishing rig ( best used in river)  8 pound main line 4 gram float, 2 bb split shoot directly under float, 2 n1 split shot spread out a few inches apart, 3 n4 split shoot also spread out evenly, (add more weight if needed) micro swivel connected to 8 lb line on one side and 2 ft of 5-6 pound fluorocarbon leader on the other side of swivel with a number 12 egg hook at the end drift roe, worm and pink worms to name a few. Good luck
